extensions.description: Extensions for map node icon game objects.

disabled_sprite.description: Reference to the disabled state sprite. This is a dim version of the enabled sprite.

enabled_sprite.description: Reference to the enabled state sprite.

frozen_sprite.description: Reference to the frozen state sprite. The banner should be covered in snow.

visited_sprite_disabled.description: Reference to the visited and disabled state sprite. The banner should be removed leaving only a stick and some rocks.

enabled_mask_sprite.description: Reference to the enabled mask state sprite. This is a black and white image which is used to make the banner glow. The default is a small black texture 2x2px.
